document.full_text: the n.f.l. and its players agreed to resume negotiations but could not come to terms on specifics, making it unlikely that either side would budge.
document.title: n.f.l. sides agree on the need for new talks, but not on who should listen
lines_and_colors: the n.f.l. and its players agreed to resume negotiations but could not come to terms on specifics, making it unlikely that either side would budge.
